short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows your friends logs at the top of the window, so you don't need to View logbook>friends logs on every cache.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loads your friends logs at the top of every cache listing, so you know which friends have visited and what was their experience!
